name: Draw Rider Copy (Test)
description:
A testing ground for a new game currently piggybacking off of Draw Rider.  In fact, it's very much similar to Draw Rider at the moment.  This project started out as being just a playground for seeing how generated levels can be made for Draw Rider, but that idea expanded a bit to say the least.

Requires Draw Rider on Steam for a level editor, since this game currently has no built in editor yet.  Any levels made in the Draw Rider editor should automatically show up in the level list to try out.
